title: Managed Delivery on Databricks: SLAs with Evidence
summary: Operate on Databricks with evidence‑led SLAs and clear run‑ownership.
bodyMd:
## Why
Enterprises want SLAs tied to evidence.

## Scope
- We run compute and deliver bundles
- You get metrics, lineage, and support

## Alignment
Evidence thresholds and change windows baked into SLAs.
